itemDescription: Scottish rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Gordon Stanley Cottington (2 April 1911 – 7 June 1996) was a Scottish rugby union and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1930s and 1940s. He played representative level rugby union (RU) for Scotland (Heritage No. 504), and at club level for Kelso RFC, as a hooker, i.e. number 2, and club level rugby league (RL) for Castleford (Heritage No. 160), as a hooker, i.e. number 9.

link_mentions.page: List of Scotland national rugby league team players
response: * Gordon Cottington, for Scotland (RU) while at Kelso RFC (RU) 1934–36 5-caps (signed Castleford 1936-37)
